value.name: Downtown event venue closed during COVID gets new life from Columbus restaurant owner
value.description: Cesar Bautista, owner of restaurant Bodega 1205 at 19 12th St., is transforming the space into 1234 Events on Broadway. “We’re keeping it the same way (as an event venue),” Bautista told the ...

value.name: Johnston Community College Dean’s List | Raleigh News & Observer
value.description: The following students, listed by community, have been named to the spring semester Dean’s List at Johnston Community College. To qualify, a student must earn a grade point average of 3.5 or ...

value.name: Enjoy Latin classics with a twist at this fusion restaurant in the heart of downtown
value.description: Owners Cesar Bautista and Jossy Velez opened the Latin American fusion restaurant at 19 12th St. in late 2019, and it has become an established breakfast, lunch and weekend brunch spot downtown.
